forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 5am, then patchy fog and a slight chance of rain showers. Cloudy, with a low around 71. West wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
